p: The size of egg albumin (Alb)-FA nanocomplexes prepared by mixing egg Alb NPs with FA did not change after adjusting the pH from 3 to 4, but showed considerable increase after adjusting pH to 5, 6, or 7; however, the bioavailability of FA in the form of digested nanocomplexes for Lactobacillus rhamnosus was improved [ 105].
